description:
---updated version coming soon : ) maybe-----

Drop tiddies and merge them to create bigger tiddies. Try to reach the golden tiddies.

Mouse left button drag to move tiddies, release click to drop. Easy!

Part of BooBJam2020 and a fundraiser for breast cancer research.

Thanks for playing :)

Couple of UI assets from Cherry Blossom GUI pack 

SFX  from  Sidearm Studios Ultimate Sound FX Bundle 

GitHub link coming soon
